metadata.title: Block IP Nested Remediation - Forcepoint NGFW
metadata.description: This playbook checks if malicious IP address is blocked or unblocked by SMC firewall.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially malicious IP addresses
2. If malicious IP address is not blocked by SMC firewall then blocks it.
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Forcepoint SMC API Key should be known.[Refer here](http://www.websense.com/content/support/library/ngfw/v610/rfrnce/ngfw_6100_ug_smc-api_a_en-us.pdf )
3. Forcepoint SMC Version number should be known. [Refer here](https://help.stonesoft.com/onlinehelp/StoneGate/SMC/)
4. IP address list name for blocking IP address present in SMC should be known.

metadata.description: Enter name for playbook without spaces
Enter the name for your Forcepoint SMC Connector without spaces
Enter the api key for smc login
Enter SMC Api key Version Number
Enter IP List Name present in SMC

Initialize_variable_Terminate.description: This holds the variable terminate to terminate the logic app

Initialize_variable_for_IP_Address.description: Binding Ip address to this IP address variable

Initialize_variable_for_IP_list_name.description: Initialize variable for IP list name

Initialize_variable_to_Error.description: To keep the error into this variable and pass it to wherever required.

Initialize_variable_to_SMC_Api_Version_N.description: To keep SMC Api version number. Forcepoint will update the SMC version every year

Initialize_variable_to_consolidate_varia.description: To form a JSON object to pass it into Allaction variable

Initialize_variable_to_keep_all_actions.description: To store IP address , severity , action to be taken into one array varriable and we can create a table.

SMC_API_Key.description: SMC API Key is to store Api key for login

Terminate_the_playbook_if_API_issue_occu.description: Terminate the playbook if API issue occurred

Condition_to_check_if_needs_to_be_termin.description: Condition to check if needs to be terminated

Create_HTML_table_for_Add_comment_to_inc.description: Creating a HTML table from all actions taken by IP address

Append_to_array_variable_to_Not_exit_IP_.description: Append to array variable to Not exit IP address

Append_to_array_variable_to_array_for_ac.description: Append to array variable to array for actions

Check_the_result_length_from_filter_outp.description: We will check for the result output is empty or exist in the policy rule. If result output is empty ,then there is no policy based on IP Address. And If result ouput is having some information related to IP Address then there is a policy with respect to IP

Looping_IP_Address.description: Here we are looping each IP Address and check whether it is blocked or not

Set_variable_for_IP_list_array_from_SMC_.description: Set variable for IP list array from SMC IP address

inputs.name: Error
inputs.value: @{variables('IP list name')} is does not exist in the Forcepoint SMC

Set_variable_to_login_unsuccessful.description: When unsuccessful login atempt has done then we can bind the error to "Error" variable.

Terminate_if_login_is_unsuccessful.description: Terminate if login is unsuccessful login attempt

Login.description: Before take an action against to any other api in Forcepoint SMC we need to do login.

inputs.name: Error
inputs.value: IP Address not found from sentinel incident.

Set_variable_to_error_variable_if_IP_Add.description: Binding the error to "Error" variable and pass it to incident comment.

Terminate_if_there_are_no_inputs_from_se.description: Terminate the playbook if there are no inputs from sentinel

Check_if_body_present_from_output.description: Form this condition, we will check like if body present in the sentinel incident or not and we will check the Ip address are available or not.
